verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:3
verses.text: This is an evil among all things that are done under the sun, that there is one event unto all: yea, also the heart of the sons of men is full of evil, and madness is in their heart while they live, and after that they go to the dead.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 9:4
verses.text: For to him that is joined to all the living there is hope: for a living dog is better than a dead lion.
